tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
